subject: Re: [PATCH v2 2/2] selftests/cgroup: add test for zswap incompressible pages

reviews.author: Jiayuan Chen (author)
reviews.summary: The reviewer approved the patch and acknowledged its correctness but suggested to add a comment explaining why the incompressible pages are stored as-is.

reviews.author: Yosry Ahmed
reviews.summary: The reviewer found the patch's comment not very useful but still approved it, giving a Reviewed-by tag.

reviews.author: Nhat Pham
reviews.summary: The reviewer suggested using MADV_PAGEOUT instead of memory.reclaim and approved the patch.

reviews.author: SeongJae Park
reviews.summary: The reviewer approved the patch, calling it 'useful' and 'nice', but suggested minor formatting improvements.

reviews.author: JP Kobryn
reviews.summary: Reviewer JP Kobryn suggested using synchronization (eventfd) to prevent a potential race condition between parent and child processes in the selftest.

reviews.author: Chengming Zhou
reviews.summary: Reviewer Chengming Zhou approved the patch and gave a Reviewed-by tag, but no specific technical comments were provided.
